name: Coma - The Prequel
description: WARNING: This is the first RPG that i made, so please no hate :l This series is gonna be about a kid that had a coma by a car accident. He went to an another dimension with a friend of his own that is a Book, and it can do magical stuff. This is the prequel to all chapters, i hope you will stay with me! ^^ -Tip- If you don't know how to get off the bed, interact with it.
